script_logic.description: The script runs four I/O benchmarks using the 'ior' tool, each with different file formats and operations (POSIX write, POSIX read, HDF5 write, HDF5 read). The script utilizes the 'tau_exec' tool for performance analysis. It leverages Slurm for job submission and resource management.
steps: Clean up previous files and directories
Create data directory and logs directory
Run POSIX write benchmark with tau_exec and store output in logs/posix_write
Run POSIX read benchmark with tau_exec and store output in logs/posix_read
Run HDF5 write benchmark with tau_exec and store output in logs/hdf5_write
Run HDF5 read benchmark with tau_exec and store output in logs/hdf5_read
